wikipedia_page.main: John Collier Fowler (17 November 1902 – 1979) was an English footballer who played as a full-back for Bradford City and Torquay United in the 1920s and 1930s.

response: John or Jack Fowler may refer to:
* Jack Fowler (footballer, born 1899) (1899–1975), Plymouth Argyle, Swansea Town and Wales international footballer
* Jack Fowler (footballer, born 1902) (1902–1979), English footballer with Bradford City and Torquay United
